You can create an CoppockCurve indicator that does not automatically update. This lets you update the indicator with any data you choose. The following reference table describes the CoppockCurve constructor.

CoppockCurve()1/3

            CoppockCurve QuantConnect.Indicators.CoppockCurve (
   )

Initializes a new instance of the CoppockCurve" /> indicator with its default values.

Parameters
This constructor does not take any argument.

Return

CoppockCurve - The new CoppockCurve indicator object.

Initializes a new instance of the CoppockCurve" /> indicator.

CoppockCurve - The new CoppockCurve indicator object.

Definition at line 66 of file Indicators/CoppockCurve.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.


private CoppockCurve _cc;

// In Initialize()
_cc = new CoppockCurve(name, shortRocPeriod, longRocPeriod, lwmaPeriod);
_cc.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _cc, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_cc.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _cc.Current.Value;
}
    
# In Initialize()
self.cc = CoppockCurve(name, shortRocPeriod, longRocPeriod, lwmaPeriod)
self.cc.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.cc, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.cc.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.cc.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with time/decimal pair. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

    
private CoppockCurve _cc;
private Symbol symbol;

// In Initialize()
_cc = new CoppockCurve(shortRocPeriod, longRocPeriod, lwmaPeriod);
symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _cc.Update(data[symbol].EndTime, data[symbol].High);
}
if (_cc.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _cc.Current.Value;
}
    
# In Initialize()
self.cc = CoppockCurve(shortRocPeriod, longRocPeriod, lwmaPeriod)
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.cc.Update(data[self.symbol].EndTime, data[self.symbol].High)
if self.cc.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.cc.Current.Value
